‚ö†Ô∏è Important: AI-Generated Content

Arc uses AI (Google Gemini) to generate summaries, chat responses, and custom action results. While we strive for accuracy, AI-generated content:

  • May contain errors or miss important details
  • Should not be relied upon for critical decisions
  • Is for informational purposes only
  • Is not a substitute for reading the original content
  • May vary in quality for different types of content

Always verify important information from the original source.

‚ôø Designed for Everyone

While Arc is a powerful productivity tool for everyone, it was built on a foundation of accessibility. It serves as an essential assistive tool for users with dyslexia, low vision, and other reading challenges by making digital content more digestible and audible.

We believe that by building for accessibility first, we create a product that is more robust and useful for all.

üîí Privacy First

Your data belongs to you. Arc ONLY accesses screen content when you tap a sidebar button (AI Summary, AI Read, Save Content, Custom Action, or Chat) - never in the background. Screen text is processed for AI responses but never stored on our servers. All saved content, chat history, and custom actions are stored securely in protected local storage on your device. Optional Google Drive backup gives you complete control over your data.

App Management: Arc automatically blocks itself in 400+ sensitive apps (banking, crypto, password managers) by default. You can customize which apps Arc works with in Settings.

‚ùì Frequently Asked Questions

Do I need to create an account?

No! You can use Arc as a guest. Google Sign-In is optional and only needed for cloud backup and community features (publishing actions).

Does Arc monitor my screen in the background?

Absolutely not. Arc only accesses screen content when you explicitly tap a button in the sidebar. It never monitors your screen passively.

Are screenshots automatically captured?

No. Screenshots require your explicit permission and are only taken when you initiate an action that needs them. You control screenshot capture for each feature.

Which apps work with Arc?

Arc works with virtually any app on your device - browsers, social media, email, documents, and more. However, Arc automatically disables itself in 400+ sensitive apps (banking, crypto, password managers) by default. You can customize this in Settings > App Management.

Is my data private?

Yes. Screen content is processed for AI responses but never stored on our servers. Your saved content, chat history, and custom actions stay on your device unless you choose Google Drive backup. See our Privacy Policy for details.

What are Custom Actions?

Custom Actions let you create your own AI commands. Write a prompt like "Translate to Spanish" or "Explain like I'm 5" and save it to your sidebar for one-tap access. You can also enable screenshot capture and web search for each action.

What are Community Actions?

Community Actions are AI actions shared by other Arc users. You can browse, search, and add them to your sidebar with one tap. You can also publish your own Custom Actions to help others. Your email will be visible when you publish.

How does Chat with AI work?

Chat lets you have conversations about content on your screen. Tap the Chat button in the sidebar, and you can ask questions, get clarifications, or explore topics further. You can also attach screenshots to your messages for visual context.
